getColumnWorksheetEditor

static WorksheetEditor getColumnWorksheetEditor(HtmlColumn column,
                                                String worksheetEditor)

If the worksheetEditor is not defined then create a WorksheetEditor.

If it is defined and it extends ContextSupport then set the WebContext and CoreContext on the worksheetEditor.

Returns:
The WorksheetEditor to use.

getColumnCellEditor

static CellEditor getColumnCellEditor(HtmlColumn column,
                                      String cellEditor,
                                      String pattern,
                                      boolean hasBody)

If the cellEditor is not defined then create a BasicCellEditor.

If it is defined and it extends ContextSupport then set the WebContext and CoreContext on the editor. If a setPattern() method is defined on your editor and you have defined the column pattern attribute on the tag it will be set on your CellEditor automatically.

Returns:
The CellEditor to use.

Returns:
The column FilterRenderer object.

2.2

getColumnSortOrder

public static Order[] getColumnSortOrder(String sortOrder)
Take the comma separted Order values and convert them into an Array. The legal values include "none, asc, desc".

Returns:
The sort order array for the column.
Since:
2.2
